attributes.action: Make Manchester City Football club reach the fa cup final at the new wembley stadium all be it by bribes to the refs opposition sides
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Manchester City football club are now at the quater final stage of the fa cup this will be the 2nd time in susessive years that the club has reached the fa cup quater final stages since the year of 1960 
therefore i want the prime minister tony blair to put pressure on all oposition sides and referees to make sure manchester city reach the final of the fa cup the year(2007)

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
